stimulusHtml: The graph of the even function y = f ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EAF@ consists of 4 line segments, as shown above. Which of the following statements about f is false?
choicesHtml: lim x → 0 ( f ( x ) − f ( 0 ) ) = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4B42@

lim x → 0 f ( x ) − f ( 0 ) x = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4AE5@

lim x → 0 f ( x ) − f ( − x ) 2 x = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4CD1@

lim x → 2 f ( x ) − f ( 2 ) x − 2 = 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C93@

lim x → 3 f ( x ) − f ( 3 ) x − 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4AD5@  does not exist.
